text: فاما نذهبن بك فانا منهم منتقمون

translations.translation: Either We will extricate you and take revenge on them
We shall punish them whether We take you away,
We shall inflict retribution on them, whether We take you away from the world (before We do that),
We shall revenge them either after your death
So if We take you away, We shall then indeed take revenge from them.
And even if We take you away, We shall indeed take vengeance on them.
But if We should take you away, still We shall inflict retribution on them;
Whether We take thee away, We shall take vengeance upon them,
And if We take thee away, We surely shall take vengeance on them,
Even if We take you away from the world, We shall surely take vengeance on them
And if We take thee away. We shall surely take vengeance on them.
We will indeed take vengeance on them, whether We take you away
Even if We take thee away, We shall be sure to exact retribution from them,
And even if We take you (O Muhammad SAW) away, We shall indeed take vengeance on them.
Even if We take you away, We shall take vengeance upon them,
Even if We take you away, We will wreak vengeance upon them.
And whether [or not] We take you away [in death], indeed, We will take retribution upon them.

[43:41] So if (fa-immā: the conditional particle in has been assimilated herein with an extra mā) We take you away, by making you die before chastising them, then We will take vengeance on them, in the Hereafter;
(And if We take thee away) if We make you die, (We surely shall take vengeance on them) by punishing them,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثم سجل سبحانه على أخذ المشركين والانتقام عنهم بقوله: { فَإِمَّا نَذْهَبَنَّ بِكَ } أي: أن نتوفينك يا أكمل الرسل، ونخرجنك عن الدنيا قبل انتقامنا منهم، وأخذنا إياهم { فَإِنَّا مِنْهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ } [الزخرف: 41] ألبتة بعد مماتك ووفاتك

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { فإما نَذْهَبَنَّ بك } أي: فإن قبضناك قبل أن ننصرك على أعدائك، ونشفي صدور المؤمنين منهم، { فإنا منهم منتقمون } أشد الانتقام في الآخرة
